sections.instructor: Panahandeh, Mohammad, Prerequisite: CHEM-120 and PHYS-130 or equivalents Note: Partially online course. In addition to online instruction, this class has required on ground weekly meetings on Wednesday from 2:30-6:30PM for labs and exams. Lecture and other activities will be provided via the internet through the college learning management system CANVAS and Zoom software. Access to a computer with a webcam and a microphone is required. Go to www.dvc.edu/online for course access information. This course may use online exam proctoring software to administer exams.
